summary.span: 表示可完全包含所指定文本内容的最小和最大可能的段落宽度。

span.span: Represents the smallest and largest possible paragraph width that can fully contain the specified text content.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性生成带格式的文本行的最小段落宽度。The following example shows how to use the property to generate the minimum paragraph width for the formatted lines of text. remarks.format: ## Remarks 最小段落宽度对应于在的文本内容中具有最大宽度的单词。The minimum paragraph width corresponds to the word that has the greatest width in the text content. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性生成带格式的文本行的最小段落宽度。The following example shows how to use the property to generate the minimum paragraph width for the formatted lines of text.
